verses.roman:
eta bali' gelā śacī gṛhe karma karite
lukāñā lāgilā śiśu mṛttikā khāite

synonyms: eta bali'-saying this; gelā—returned; śacī—mother Śacī; gṛhe—in the house; karma—duties; karite—to execute; lukāñā—hiding; lāgilā—began; śiśu—the child; mṛttikā—dirt; khāite—to eat.
translation: But when she returned to her household duties, the child hid from His mother and began to eat dirt.
